/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees and grass contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. Overall, the image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing its blend of nature and urban development.
